changeSet.author: skirpichenok
changeSet.comment: set field not_started to TRUE for all event_crf that do not have data in the item_data table (it's needed for prev DB)
changeSet.sql: update event_crf ec set not_started = true, owner_id = null where (select count(id.item_data_id) from item_data id where id.event_crf_id = ec.event_crf_id) = 0
